name: The Digital (Un)fair
description:
(Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move, mouse to look around)

The Digital (Un)fair

Submission for the Leeds 2023 Game Jam by Joe Mahon.

The theme assigned was 'an angry funfair', taking inspiration from Ellie Harrison's Grief Series.

Contains a couple of minigames tied to themes of frustration and annoyance, aiming for a bit of cathartic release!

Zoom Doom

Since the pandemic started we have probably all had video calls with miserable colleagues, dull relatives and over-zealous quiz-masters. Take out some of that frustration and zap them away!

Commute Chaos

As anyone who has tried to use public transport in Leeds knows, it's BLOODY AWFUL.

The bus never turns up on time, is always slow, and super expensive. It feels like just throwing money into a hole, which is what you'll have to do to make your bus move
faster and beat your colleagues to work! (Meant to be a bit like the horse racing games at fairs/seaside arcades!)
